Key Match Events: The match was called off without a ball being bowled because of rain.
Both teams took a point each, as the USA progressed to the next round.
The result also knocked Pakistan out of the tournament even before they could play their final game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The USA will face South Africa in their first game of the Super Eights, followed by the West Indies.
The USA kicked off their campaign with a win over neighbours Canada and then pulled off the biggest upset in the tournament’s history by beating Pakistan in a super over.
The USA finish their group phase with five points, coming second in Group A behind India.
With this, they have also sealed qualification for the 2026 T20 World Cup.
